title: Curriculum Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Social Constructivist Learning Environment Design Based on MOOC Forums

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and intermediate-level practical knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can propose solutions to real-world social problems three or more times through interactions with peers and instructors in MOOC forums.
Learners can reconstruct their knowledge systems twice or more based on peer feedback using topic discussion boards.
Learners can complete a knowledge-sharing process with team members once or more using collaboration tools in forums for project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
